247.description: Configure le bot pour qu'il reste dans le salon vocal.

errors.not_in_voice: `❌` | Vous devez être dans un salon vocal pour utiliser cette commande.
errors.generic: `❌` | Une erreur s'est produite lors de l'exécution de cette commande.

messages.enabled:
`✅` | Le mode 24/7 a été **activé**. 
`🎧` Le bot restera dans le salon vocal, même s'il n'y a plus personne.

lavalink.title: ⚙️ Lavalink Statistics

invite.content:
`👋` **Invite me to your server!**

Click the button below to add me to your server!
In case of bugs or issues, join the support server! `💖`

vote.content:
`👍` **Support Panais by voting!**

Click the button below to vote for me! `😊`

premium.content:
`✨` **Unlock exclusive features and support the bot's development!**

Click the button below to go Premium! `🚀`

support.description: Get the invite link for the support server.
support.content:
`💡` **Need help?**

Join our support server by clicking the button below! `😄`

clusters.description: Displays information about the shard clusters.
clusters.author: 🌐 Panais's Shards Information

options.role: Choose a role to get information about it.

errors.role_not_found: `❌` | Role not found. Please mention a valid role or provide a valid role ID.

options.user: The user to get information about.

userinfo.footer: Don't forget to vote! Thank you!

options.command: The command you want to get information about.

help.content:
`👋` Hello! I am <@{bot}>, a music bot. You can use `{prefix}help <command>` to get more information about a command.

`👍` Vote for the bot to unlock features! [Vote Here](https://top.gg/bot/{client}/vote)
help.title: 📖 Help Menu
help.footer: Use {prefix}help <command> for more information about a command.

dj.description: Manage DJ mode and associated roles.

options.add: The DJ role you want to add.
options.remove: The DJ role you want to remove.

messages.role_exists: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> is already added.
messages.role_added: `🎧` | The DJ role <@&{roleId}> has been added.
messages.role_not_found: The DJ role <@&{roleId}> is not added.
messages.role_removed: `🗑️` | The DJ role <@&{roleId}> has been removed.
messages.all_roles_cleared: `🧹` | All DJ roles have been cleared.

options.language: The language you want to set.
options.reset: Reset the language to the default language.

errors.invalid_language:
`❌` | Please provide a valid language. Example: `EnglishUS` for English (United States)

You can find the list of supported languages [here](https://discord.com/developers/docs/reference#locales)

**Available Languages:**
{languages}

messages.already_set: The language is already set to `{language}`.
messages.set: `✅` | The language has been set to `{language}`.

options.reset: Reset the server settings to default.

errors.reset_error: `❌` | The `{parameter}` setting could not be reset. Please check the parameter name.
errors.reset_missing: `❌` | You must specify a parameter to reset.

messages.reset_success: `✅` | The `{parameter}` setting has been reset successfully.

prefix.description: Displays or sets the bot's prefix.

options.prefix: The prefix you want to set.
options.reset: Resets the prefix to the default.

errors.prefix_too_long: `❌` | The prefix cannot be longer than 3 characters.

messages.current_prefix: The prefix for this server is `{prefix}`.
messages.prefix_set: The prefix for this server is now `{prefix}`.
messages.prefix_reset: The prefix for this server is now `{prefix}`.

options.theme: The theme to set (classic, modern or modernpro).

errors.choice: `❌` | Invalid theme. Available themes are `classic`, `modern` and `modernpro`.

theme.set_theme: `✅` | The theme has been set to **{theme}**.
theme.reset: `✅` | The theme has been reset to **{defaultTheme}**.

defaultvolume.description: Sets or resets the default volume for the server.

options.reset: Reset the default volume to the default level.

errors.invalid_number: `❌` | The volume you entered is not a valid number.
errors.too_low: `❌` | The volume is too low. It must be at least 0.
errors.too_high: `❌` | The volume is too high. It cannot exceed 200.

messages.set: `🔊` | The default volume has been set to {volume}.
messages.reset: The default volume has been reset to {volume}.

errors.channel_exists: `❌` | The song request channel already exists.
errors.channel_not_exists: `❌` | The song request channel does not exist.
errors.channel_delete_fail: `❌` | The song request channel has been deleted. If the channel is not deleted normally, please delete it yourself.

messages.channel_created: `🎉` | The song request channel has been created in <#{channelId}>.
messages.channel_deleted: `🗑️` | The song request channel has been deleted.

options.create: Creates a musical captcha channel for verification.
options.delete: Deletes the existing musical captcha channel.
options.info: Displays information about the musical captcha channel.

errors.channel_not_exists: ❌ | The musical captcha channel does not exist.

messages.channel_created: 🎉 | The musical captcha channel has been created in <#{channelId}>.
messages.channel_deleted: 🗑️ | The musical captcha channel has been deleted.
messages.channel_info: 🎤 | The musical captcha channel is <#{channelId}> and the assigned role ID is <@&{roleId}>.

captcha.label: Click to listen to the music
captcha.title: 🎧 Musical Captcha
captcha.tuto:
Welcome to the music captcha! To access the server, follow these steps:

 1. Click the button below to listen to the song.
 2. After listening to the song, reply in this channel with the exact title of the song.
 3. If your answer is correct, you will gain access to the server!

 Note: You have 1 minute to respond with the exact title of the song.
 Good luck!

options.level: The BassBoost level you want to set

pitch.description: Changes the pitch of the song.

options.pitch: The number you want to set the pitch to (between 0.5 and 5).

errors.invalid_number: `❌` | Please provide a valid number between **0.5** and **5**.

messages.pitch_set: `✅` | The pitch has been set to **{pitch}**.

rate.description: Changes the rate of the song.

options.rate: The number you want to set the rate to (between 0.5 and 5).

errors.invalid_number: `❌` | Please provide a valid number between **0.5** and **5**.

messages.rate_set: `✅` | The rate has been set to **{rate}**.

speed.description: Changes the speed of the song.

options.speed: The speed you want to set (between 0.5 and 5).

errors.invalid_number: `❌` | Please provide a valid number between **0.5** and **5**.

messages.set_speed: `✅` | The speed has been set to **{speed}**.

errors.no_song: `❌` | There are no songs in the queue.
errors.no_player: `❌` | There is no active player in this server.

errors.no_song: `❌` | There are no songs in the queue.
errors.no_player: `❌` | There is no active player in this server.

errors.dm_failed: `❌` | I couldn't send you a DM. Make sure direct message is enabled.

grab.description: Gets the currently playing song in your DMs.

errors.not_in_channel: `❌` | I am not in a voice channel.

lyrics.description: Gets the lyrics of the currently playing song or a specified song.

options.song: The name of the song you want to search the lyrics for.

errors.no_lyrics_found: `❌` | No lyrics found for this song!
errors.no_song: `❌` | No song provided or currently playing.

loop.description: Loop the current song or queue.

leavecleanup.description: Removes all the songs from users who are not in the voice channel.

messages.successfully_paused: `⏸️` | The song has been paused successfully.

play.description: Play a song from Spotify, Deezer, Apple, SoundCloud or JioSaavn.

options.song: The song you want to play.

playnext.description: Add the song to play next in the queue.

options.song: The song you want to play.

messages.added_to_play_next: `🎶` | Adding [{title}]({uri}) to play next in the queue.
messages.added_playlist_to_play_next: `🎶` | Adding {length} songs to play next in the queue.

remove.description: Removes a song from the queue.

options.song: The number of the song you want to remove.

errors.no_songs: `❌` | There are no songs in the queue.
errors.invalid_number: `❌` | Please provide a valid song number.

messages.removed: `🗑️` | Song number {songNumber} removed from the queue.

errors.not_seekable: `❌` | Cannot replay this song because it is not seekable.

options.song: The song you want to search for.

messages.description: `🔎` | Here are `{maxTracks}` tracks based on your search `{query}`. Please choose the one that suits you.

seek.description: Seeks to a specific time in the song.

options.duration: The duration you want to seek to.

errors.invalid_format: `❌` | Invalid time format. Examples: seek 1m, seek 1h 30m
errors.beyond_duration: `❌` | Cannot seek beyond the song duration of {length}.

errors.no_songs: `❌` | There are no songs in the queue.
`❌` | There are no songs in the queue.

skipto.description: Skips to a specific song in the queue.

options.number: The number of the song you want to skip to.

stop.description: Stops the music and clears the queue.

volume.description: Sets the volume of the player.

options.number: The volume you want to set.

errors.too_low: `❌` | The volume cannot be lower than 0.
errors.too_high: `❌` | The volume cannot be higher than 200. Do you want to damage your hearing or your speakers? Hmm, I don't think that's a good idea.

addsong.description: Adds a song to the playlist.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to add to.
options.song: The song you want to add.

errors.name_too_short: `❌` | The playlist name must be at least 3 characters long.
errors.playlist_exists: `❌` | A playlist with this name already exists. Please use a different name.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to delete.

list.description: Gets all playlists of the user.

options.user: The user you want to get the playlists of.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to load.

removesong.description: Removes a song from the playlist.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to remove from.
options.song: The song you want to remove.

errors.error_occurred: `❌` | An error occurred while removing the song.

steal.description: Steals a playlist from another user and adds it to your playlists.

options.playlist: The playlist you want to steal.
options.user: The user you want to steal the playlist from.

errors.playlist_not_exist: `❌` | This playlist does not exist for the mentioned user.
errors.playlist_exists: `❌` | A playlist named **{playlist}** already exists in your collection.

dispatcher.title: Empty Voice Channel
dispatcher.description:
I left <#{voiceChannel}> because I was left alone. 

To enable 24/7 mode, use the `24/7` command. Unlock more features by voting.
